name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a friendly and energetic Labrador Retriever looking for an active family.
personality: Playful and affectionate, loves outdoor activities.
history: Rescued from a shelter, Buddy is healthy and well-socialized.
medicalNotes: Up-to-date with vaccinations, neutered.
adoptionRequirements: Buddy needs a home with a fenced yard and preferably with experience in handling large dogs.

name: Luna
description: Luna is a sweet and gentle Golden Retriever who loves cuddles and fetch.
personality: Friendly with everyone, enjoys playing with toys.
history: Owner surrendered due to moving, Luna is in good health and loves attention.
medicalNotes: Spayed, vaccinated, and microchipped.
adoptionRequirements: Luna would thrive in a home with a yard and an active lifestyle.

name: Max
description: Max is a loyal and intelligent German Shepherd seeking a loving and committed family.
personality: Smart, protective, and enjoys learning new commands.
history: Found as a stray, Max has been trained and socialized.
medicalNotes: Neutered, up-to-date on vaccinations.
adoptionRequirements: Max needs an experienced owner who understands the breed and can provide mental stimulation.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a playful and affectionate French Bulldog looking for a loving home.
personality: Funny, loves attention, and enjoys short walks.
history: Surrendered by previous owner, Milo is in good health and loves to play with toys.
medicalNotes: Vaccinated, microchipped, and in good health.
adoptionRequirements: Milo would do well in a home with a family that enjoys indoor activities and can provide companionship.

name: Sophie
description: Sophie is a gentle and intelligent Poodle who loves to be pampered.
personality: Calm, well-behaved, and enjoys learning new tricks.
history: Rescued from neglect, Sophie has recovered and is ready for a loving home.
medicalNotes: Spayed, vaccinated, and microchipped.
adoptionRequirements: Sophie needs a home with a comfortable space and someone who can spend time grooming her.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a loyal and energetic Boxer who loves outdoor adventures.
personality: Playful, affectionate, and protective of his family.
history: Surrendered due to owner's health issues, Rocky is healthy and loves to play fetch.
medicalNotes: Neutered, vaccinated, and in good health.
adoptionRequirements: Rocky would do well in an active home where he can get regular exercise and attention.

name: Coco
